description: Utility functions for working with index.json files

functions.name: readIndexFile
functions.description: Reads data from an index.json file and returns it as an object

functions.name: writeIndexFile
functions.description: Writes data to an index.json file

functions.name: updateIndexFile
functions.description: Updates an existing index.json file with new data

functions.name: deleteKeyFromIndexFile
functions.description: Deletes a specific key from an index.json file
